result.discription: 2 ripe peaches, sliced (fresh or frozen), 1 banana, sliced (fresh or frozen), 1/2 cup Greek yogurt or dairy-free yogurt, 1/2 cup almond milk or any milk of your choice, 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup (optional, depending on sweetness preference), Ice cubes (optional, for a colder smoothie)
